content.question: The choice of imagery on the breastplate of the individual depicted was most likely intended to elicit which of the following responses from viewers?

choices.label: Reverence for his status as only prophet of a single true deity
Appreciation of his services as protector of peace and prosperity
Empathy for his display of humility and earthly suffering
Fear of his power to hand out judgment and punishment to his people

content.answer: Appreciation of his services as protector of peace and prosperity

topic.text: 2.3: Purpose and Audience in Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
